title: The memorable works of a son of thunder and consolation namely that true prophet and faithful servant of God and sufferer for the testimony of Jesus, Edward Burroughs, who dyed a prisoner for the word of God in the city of London, the fourteenth of the twelfth moneth, 1662.
author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed and published for the good and benefit of generations to come ...,
